game.beginning: The player starts as a rookie adventurer in a fantasy world. Initially, the player helps village people with small tasks to gain their trust.
game.ending: After defeating the evil tyrant and freeing the world from his reign, the player is hailed as the greatest hero. The world is peaceful once again and the player can continue their adventures exploring the world.
game.synopsis: In this fantasy game, the player is a novice adventurer setting out on an epic quest to defeat an evil tyrant who threatens to conquer the world. As the story progresses, the player encounters various characters, completes quests, gains experience, and hones their battling skills in preparation for the final showdown. Along the way, they discover the true meaning of heroism and the power of unity.
game.title: Chronicles of Unity
